c74object.name: ambicube~
c74object.description: The ambicube~ object spatializes a mono sound in space thanks to the ambisonic B format by Michael Gerzon. The gains of the eight loudspeakers, forming a cube, help creating a virtual location of the sound source around the listener in three dimensions.

metadatalist.metadata: R.MIGNOT, B.COURRIBET, CICM, Paris-8 University, MSH Paris Nord, ACI Jeunes, Max 6.0.4 version by E.PARIS

inlet.digest: Audio signal input or source coordinates and other messages.
Abscissa or distance of the source, according to the coordinate type.
ordinate or angle of the source in degrees, according to the coordinate type.
height or elevation angle of the source, according to the coordinate type.

objarg.name: coordinate-type
objarg.description: Coordinate type : 'c' = cartesian, 'p' = cylindrical, 's' = spherical, cartesian by default.

objarg.name: ambisonic-offset
objarg.description: Set the Ambisonic offset. By default 0.3.

objarg.name: interpolation-time
objarg.digest: Set the Interpolation time in ms. (Works with control data only).
objarg.description: Set the Interpolation time in ms. (Works with control data only). By default 10.

method.name: mute_sig
method.description: In order to desactivate the audio inlets. When they are desactivated, the list coordinates is received by the first inlet.

method.name: change_type
method.description: In order to change the coordinates type: 'c'= cartesian, 'p' = polar.

c74object.discussion: The ambicube~ object spatializes a mono sound in space thanks to the ambisonic B format by Michael Gerzon. The gains of the eight loudspeakers, forming a cube, help creating a virtual location of the sound source around the listener in three dimensions.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: The ambicube~ object spatializes a mono sound in space thanks to the ambisonic B format by Michael Gerzon. The gains of the eight loudspeakers, forming a cube, help creating a virtual location of the sound source around the listener in three dimensions.
